mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remote_addr AS "remoteAddr", a.user_agent AS "userAgent", a.request_uri AS "requestUri", a.method AS "method", a.params AS "params", a.send_by AS "sendBy", a.receive_by AS "receiveBy", a.send_date AS "sendDate", a.attach_name AS "attachName", a.success AS "success", a.exception AS "exception"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_log_email( id, title, create_by, create_date, remote_addr, user_agent, request_uri, method, params, send_by, receive_by, send_date, attach_name, success, exception ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remoteAddr}, #{userAgent}, #{requestUri}, #{method}, #{params}, #{sendBy}, #{receiveBy}, #{sendDate}, #{attachName}, #{success}, #{exception} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_log_email SET title = #{title}, remote_addr = #{remoteAddr}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, request_uri = #{requestUri}, method = #{method}, params = #{params}, send_by = #{sendBy}, receive_by = #{receiveBy}, send_date = #{sendDate}, attach_name = #{attachName}, success = #{success}, exception = #{exception} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT date_format(a.send_date, '%Y%m') as "name", count(1) as "cnt" FROM sys_log_email a
a.success = '1'
AND date_format(a.send_date, '%Y') = #{yearstr}
AND date_format(a.send_date, '%Y%m') >= date_format(#{fromDate}, '%Y%m')
AND date_format(a.send_date, '%Y%m') <= date_format(#{toDate}, '%Y%m')
GROUP BY name ORDER BY name
